title: Death Slayer V

Repack Features

  • Based on Death.Slayer.V-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-death.slayer.v.iso (11,127,914,496 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.4 to 6.4 GB)
  • Installation takes 10-15 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12.5 GB (29.7 GB during installation)
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Death Slayer V is a single player, first person zombie shooter set in a beautiful open world with next gen graphics. This game is for higher end gaming PC’s and will definitely let your PC stretch its legs… see what your PC can do on 1080p or 4K.

Unfolding Plot:
A virus has escaped a secret lab run by the Eibmoz Corporation. Everyone is infected… including yourself. You have minutes before you die from the fast acting virus and turn into a “Zombie”. There may be a way to stay alive… but it won’t be easy! You find a syringe with an antidote that will only keep the virus at bay for minutes at a time and has to be mixed with fresh zombie blood to work. Run away from the zombies but don’t run too far… because the thing that is trying to kill you, has the only thing that will keep you alive!

Fast Paced High Intensity Combat:
Play in the first person perspective as you fight your way through hordes of zombies with a wide range of weapons that you will find as you explore. Hit, stab, chop, burn, and shoot your way through the game in search of the secret lab and the mysterious voice on the other end of the phone guiding you.

Open World, Navigation and Exploration:
Use a compass and street signs to help you as you navigate the open world. Explore indoor areas in search of the items that you will need to complete your quest.

Find the Lab, maybe you will find a cure, but most importantly… Have fun, kill as many zombies as you can along the way and see how high you can get your zombie kill counter in this fast paced high intensity game.

Zombies… Can’t live with them… Can’t live without them!
